name.baseName: Enzymatic Process ; Pharmaceutical gelatin ; Skimmed beef bone, pork bone particles, etc. as raw materials ; Enzymatic preparation of bone gelatin ; All sizes; NESPS2
酶法 ; 药用明胶 ; 脱脂牛骨、猪骨骨粒等为原料 ; 酶法制骨明胶 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAnaerobic hydrolysis，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAnaerobic hydrolysis，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集涉及从脱脂牛骨、猪骨颗粒等原料中制备的药用级明胶的酶法工艺。该材料专门用于药品应用，需要高纯度的明胶用于生产胶囊、片剂和其他药物传递载体。此外，数据包括用于药品制造的废水和废气排放处理的各种末端污染管理技术，这对于减少环境影响和确保法规合规至关重要。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码27,四级代码2780文件，在完整版文件中第3258页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution ammoniaisBiological filtration method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标氨的末端治理技术是生物过滤法，其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(设备额定功率（千瓦）×设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氨，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution ammoniaisPhysical adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标氨的末端治理技术是物理吸附法，其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(设备额定功率（千瓦）×设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氨，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(设备额定功率（千瓦）×设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isCyclone dust removal + bag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是旋风+布袋，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(设备额定功率（千瓦）×设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
nan
源文件中描述为为药用明胶，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisBio-contact oxidation process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management75，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisSBR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management75，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
